description: Manifest for the Memory Bank, providing a comprehensive overview of all core files, their purpose, and their structural schemas. This serves as a central reference for AI Agents and human collaborators.

files.name: activeContext.md
files.purpose: Tracks the AI Agent's current operational phase and specific focus within the project. It's a dynamic snapshot of the active state.

files.name: progress.md
files.purpose: Detailed log of implementation activities, progress, and any blockers encountered during the current work cycle.

files.name: projectbrief.md
files.purpose: Overarching high-level vision, goals, and scope for the entire project. Serves as the strategic guiding document.

files.name: runbook.md
files.purpose: Operational procedures and troubleshooting guides for maintaining and supporting the application.

files.name: systemPatterns.md
files.purpose: Documents fundamental architectural patterns and key system-wide design decisions applied across the project.

files.name: tasks.md
files.purpose: The single source of truth for all planned, in-progress, and completed work. Follows a Work Breakdown Structure.

files.name: techContext.md
files.purpose: Detailed overview of the technical environment, technology stack, and key tools used in the project.
